summary: The Skyrim Animation Graph Overhaul (SAGO) is a modification which improves/adds gameplay and developing features related to behavior graphs.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]What does it do?[/size]
[size=3]
For players this is a set of improvements of behaviors, which includes but not limited to:
[/size][list=1][*][size=3]sneak support for any living being in the Skyrim (see the full list of supported behaviors below) - if you are tired of non-sneaking pet-followers, or you want to play as a Werewolf-assassin, then this mod is for you[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]more advanced animation transitions (planned)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
For developers it's a framework which should help:
[/size][list=1][*][size=3]in dealing with animation behaviors and categorize them in a playful manner[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]to enjoy a native sneak out of box, plus all extra perks which are coming with Creation Kit[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]to tag a new races for a custom behaviors[/size][/*]
[/list][size=6]
Show me how it looks![/size]

[youtube]fOjTlTtRYNk[/youtube] [youtube]w-oDzM2ujJ0[/youtube]
[size=6]
REQUIREMENTS
[/size][size=3]
[/size][list=1][*][size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] - Skyrim Script Extender[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] - configuration panel[/size][/*]
[/list][size=6]
INSTALLATION[/size][size=3]

[/size][list=1][*][size=3]Install requirements list[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3]Download "[color=#ff00ff]SAGO - Skyrim Animation Graph Overhaul[/color]"[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Extract to the Skyrim "Data" folder[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Enable ESP in your load order list[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Done[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
PS. It is highly recommended to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334]Mod Organizer[/url] for the complex installation/deinstallation like this.[/size]
[size=6]
DEINSTALLATION[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list=1][*][size=3]Just remove all related files[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
PS. It is highly recommended to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334]Mod Organizer[/url] for the complex installation/deinstallation like this.[/size]
[size=6]
COMPATIBILITY[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]It may be incompatible with anything what modifies animation behavior. If you found such a mod, please let me know.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Incompatible with [color=#e06666]FNIS[/color][/size][/*]
[/list][size=6]
RECOMMENDED[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list=1][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57255]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57255[/url] - "Amaterasu - The Great Spirit" follower, if you with to test a native sneak[/size]
[/*]
[/list][size=6]
CREDITS and THANKS[/size]

[size=3]- fore, for pointing how to repack XML behavior files[/size]
[size=3]- Skyrim developers for such a great sandbox[/size]
[size=6]
RELEASE NOTES[/size]

[size=4]v0.3.3 - 09/06/2014
[/size][size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]47 behaviors support. You may find a full list under the "SAGO API Reference" article[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Re-structure of the config panel [/size][/*]
[*][size=3]API functions[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]SAGO documentation[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]In-game developer tools[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=4]v0.1.2 - 08/17/2014
[/size][size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Initial upload[/size]
[/*][/list]
author: somebody
